name: Spirou
overview: While presenting inventions at the scientific research conference in New York, the Count of Chempignac is captured by Cyanure. This evil robot has one goal - to dominate the world! Without a minute to waste, Spirou will have to search New York, its streets, its metro, its skyscrapers, and even fly to the Palombia, the marshy jungle that's full of surprises ... good and bad!
